DOC.criteria: BMI 19 25 kg/m2 30 40 kg/m2 Age 20 45 year Contraindication nasoduodenal feeding tube ( e.g. , deviate nasal septum , prior upper gastrointestinal bleed , history easy bleeding ) Prior gastric intestinal surgery pancreas resection Females positive pregnancy test Known history intestinal disease include , limited , inflammatory bowel disease ( e.g . ulcerative colitis , Crohn 's disease ) , celiac sprue Type 1 type 2 diabetes Recent presence treatment gastroenteritis ( diarrhea and/or vomit ) , constipation , upper respiratory infection Anemia Abnormal EKG Prior adverse reaction anesthesia Tobacco use
